00089 class NTG_vertex_o
00090 {
00091     public:
00092     
00093     NTG_vertex_o( NTid id = 0, NTG_node_o node = NTG_node_o(), string name="")  {
00094         first = id;
00095         second = node;
00096         if (name == "") third = first;
00097         else third = name;
00098     }
00099     NTid first;
00100     NTG_node_o second;
00101     string third;
00102 };
00103

00105 //typedef pair<NTid,NTG_node_o> NTG_vertex_o;
00106 typedef vector< NTG_vertex_o > NTG_NodeContainer;
00107 typedef vector< NTG_edge_o > NTG_EdgeContainer;
00108 typedef vector< NTid >  NTG_NodeIdList;
00109 typedef Matrix< NTreal > NTG_PositiveCostMatrix;
00110 typedef Matrix< bool > NTG_AdjacencyMatrix;
00111 typedef Matrix< NTreal > NTG_NodeDistanceMatrix;
00112 
00113 template <class T> 
00114 NTG_NodeDistanceMatrix NodeDistanceMatrixConditioning(const Matrix<T> & aMtr)
00115 {
00116     NTG_NodeDistanceMatrix dMtr(aMtr.num_rows(),aMtr.num_cols());   
00117     NT_ASSERT( aMtr.size() == dMtr.size() );
00118     for (NTsize lr=0; lr < (NTsize)aMtr.num_rows(); lr++){
00119         for (NTsize lc=0; lc < (NTsize)aMtr.num_cols(); lc++) {
00120             if (lr == lc) dMtr[lr][lc] = 0;
00121             else {
00122                 T tmpVal = aMtr[lr][lc]; 
00123                 if ( 0 ==  tmpVal) dMtr[lr][lc] = 1/0.0; /* set value to infinity (NAN), this is correct code ! */ 
00124                 else
00125                 if ( (NTreal)tmpVal < 0) {
00126                     cerr << "NodeDistanceMatrixPrecondition - Warning : Negative values in matrix encountered. Using absolute values." << endl; 
00127                     dMtr[lr][lc] = -tmpVal;
00128                 } else dMtr[lr][lc] = tmpVal;
00129             }
00130         }   
00131     }
00132     
00133     return dMtr;
00134 }
00135
